text: Corbières is a municipality of the district of Gruyère in the canton of Fribourg in Switzerland. On 1 January 2011, the former municipality of Villarvolard merged into the municipality of Corbières.Nomenklaturen – Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz accessed 4 April 2011 == References == ==Other websites== Category:Municipalities in Gruyère
title: Corbières, Fribourg
